events.message: We have received the candidate's application for the Software Engineer position and will begin the review process promptly.
The application has been categorized under the Engineering cluster based on role and keywords such as 'software developer' and 'engineer' present in the resume.
A recruiter specialized in engineering roles has been assigned to manage the candidate’s application and coordinate next steps.
Conducted an initial screening call to assess the candidate’s background, experience, and fit for the software engineering position.
The candidate responded promptly and expressed strong enthusiasm about the role and the company’s engineering projects.
The technical interview with the engineering team has been scheduled for next week to evaluate coding skills and problem-solving abilities.
